description: A single genetic mutation, preferably in HGVS syntax if present.

attributes.name: gene
attributes.description: HGNC gene symbol if stated (e.g., SURF1, MT-ATP6)

attributes.name: cdna
attributes.description: cDNA notation if stated (e.g., c.26T>C, c.1276_1278delTAC)

attributes.name: protein
attributes.description: Protein notation if stated (e.g., p.Leu9Pro, p.Val426del)

attributes.name: zygosity
attributes.description: Zygosity if explicitly stated in text
